content.webTitle: Pick of the week: London: Theatre

fields.headline: Pick of the week: Theatre
fields.bodyText: War Horse New London, WC2 National Theatre's award-winning smash hit about a young recruit and his horse in the ﬁrst world war. A Little Night Music Garrick, WC2 West End transfer for Trevor Nunn's ravishing small-scale production of Sondheim's romantic comedy. Spring Awakening Novello, W6 Deserved transfer for terriﬁc rock/pop musical based on Wedekind's 1890s drama about teenage angst. Parlour Song Almeida, N1 Jez Butterworth's quirky, oﬀ beat comedy concerns, suburbia, adultery and things disappearing. Tusk Tusk Royal Court, SW1 In her second play, Polly Stenham looks at home alone children surviving in another dysfunctional family drama.
